name: cachou
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small sweet that you eat to make your breath smell fresh: She remembered her grandmother's violet cachous. She drew a small packet of fragrant sweets called cachous from her pocket and gave him one.
More examplesFewer examplesShe took two cachous from the delicate pink-and-white porcelain box on her dressing table. As they kissed, he tasted the sweet scent of the cachou she had been sucking. She gave him a cachou every time he visited her.
